creditline: Gift of funds from Elizabeth Short and R. Kirkland Cozine
text: A man, a child, a woman, and a toddler sit on stairs. They are surrounded by green and dark hues, and abstract patterns. The man and child exchange glances in the background. The woman sits behind the toddler--both looking at the viewer with smiles on their faces.
title: Sierra and her family, on the Mississippi shore
